title: Perspectives and advances in consolidated bioprocessing strategies for lignin valorization
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1153-1184
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01435E, Review Article
Jianming Guo, Dylan Liu, Yong Xu
Complex and heterogeneous aromatic structures present limitless opportunities for the valorization of abundant residual lignin resources in nature and industry.
